dc_title_s: All Systems Permit (Not Reported - Street Level): Iowa
dc_description_s: Displays local road segments for which restriction information was not reported to the State of Iowa Department of Transportation. Specific route information is only available once zoomed into the county level. County restriction map can be found here: http://www.iowadot.gov/mvd/motorcarriers/systemmap.htm#county. Check with local officials when traveling on county roads or city streets for bridge embargo, detour, road embargo and vertical clearance information. State and interstate highways are valid routes except for restrictions listed on the bridge embargo, detour and road embargo, and vertical clearance maps located at http://www.iowadot.gov/mvd/motorcarriers/omcsMaps.htm.
